text: 5.19: Ze 2.10Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the Fhe Bakɨme Moses ga nɨɨŋgi tɨva thueŋ gangip, khaŋ ne ga suanga, ne fhura ki tɨveŋ ma. Ana maaŋ suaŋgip, ana harigi guma the suaŋrim, ana vhɨra ana zɨn ŋgɨp, mba ndɨkndɨgen vhɨra mba tɨven muunga. Mba tɨveŋ ne kɨvgi fhu, ne guigira tɨva bisaneŋ ma. Maaŋ mbui guma Hevenan ana zɨ guigira bisaŋgirga. Guma, ana Fhe Bakɨme Moses ga nɨɨŋgi tɨvi, ana nta zɨn vov, mba tɨvir harigi gumgi khɨvav mbe nzuai guma, ana Hevenan Fhe Bakɨme gari bigi, ana mba ŋanan, ana zɨ bakɨme ki.
